title: Zed is OP
body: Zed is so broken like seriously, i mean just look at pic related where he builds an IE and LW and kills me while i have 200 armor. How is it possible that someone whos meant to kill single targets and is almost full build supposed to kill me when i have so much armor. Its ok when ADcs do it because they aren't in my face and are safely killing me from a distance. So yeah riot pls nerf zed hes so OP because he can kill me and i never want to die in this game.
